events.title: Corporate Events
events.description: Oakham House blends historic charm with modern amenities, offering versatile spaces for conferences, workshops, or product launches. Elegant interiors and professional layouts create a polished, engaging environment for networking and collaboration.

events.title: Weddings & Celebrations
events.description: Romantic and intimate, Oakham House provides timeless architecture and adaptable spaces for ceremonies, receptions, and photos. Couples and guests enjoy a warm, sophisticated atmosphere, ensuring memorable, elegant celebrations.

events.title: Private Parties
events.description: Ideal for birthdays, anniversaries, or cocktail evenings, Oakham House combines inviting lounges, customizable layouts, and ambient lighting to create a lively yet refined setting for social gatherings and memorable experiences.

events.title: Cultural Events
events.description: Flexible, inspiring spaces at Oakham House suit art exhibitions, book launches, and workshops. Architectural details and welcoming atmospheres encourage interaction, appreciation, and participation in Torontoâ€™s vibrant cultural and creative scene.

location.title: Accessibility
location.text: Oakham House and the TMU Student Centre are fully accessible, with elevators, automatic doors, and accessible washrooms. Contact our Conference Coordinator to discuss any specific accommodations.

location.title: Parking & Transit
location.text: No on-site parking, but several paid lots are nearby:
list: TMU Bookstore Garage (Victoria St. between Dundas & Gould)
Pitman Hall Residence (Mutual St. between Gerrard & Gould)
City Parking (Church St. between Gould & Dundas)
Rates reflect typical downtown Toronto pricing.
Direct TTC subway access via Dundas Station.
